translations: v.高谈阔论；作哲学思考（或理论总结）；（根据某人的哲学理论）解释（等于 philosophize）

sentences.sentence: Socrates philosophised even when he was on the threshold of death.
sentences.translation: 苏格拉底在死亡的门槛上，仍不忘说哲理。

sentences.sentence: Therefore, as a man who has not thought and philosophised in vain, I seek no vengeance, plot no evil against thee.
sentences.translation: 因此，作为一个没有白白具有思想而且懂得哲理的人，我对你既不谋求报复，也不怀有邪念。
